description:
In order to save the world from the side effects of http://anidb.net/ch69718 [Washuu]`s latest experiments, http://anidb.net/ch69080 [Masaki Tenchi] goes undercover as a teacher. He is immediately swept up in a conflict between the student council and the science club, who each have a member that is key to Tenchi`s mission.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
That`s "Mr. Tenchi" to you! Our ponytailed hero braves treacherous nature and bewildering encounters en route to his new gig: assistant teacher at an all-girls` high school.
Source: Amazon

President Momo and the rest of the Student Council give Tenchi a tour of the school. But the group have some pointed questions for their new teacher.
Source: Amazon

Washu sends Tenchi back in time to help a lost young girl, setting a wild chain of events in motion.
Source: Amazon

After a narrow escape, Tenchi learns that the rivalry between the Student Council and the Science Club runs deep. All the way underground, in fact.
Source: Amazon

The Student Council arrives to get Tenchi out of a bind. What a first day on the job!
Source: Amazon

Back home at last, Tenchi has a chance to decompress -- mostly -- with Sasami, Aeka and Ryoko.
Source: Amazon

In the past, Tenchi and young Momo run into some familiar-looking locals, plus one very out-of-place space pirate.
Source: Amazon

Ms. Kurihara sees potential in Tenchi, but the young assistant teacher has to intervene in a squabble over the Science Club`s budgetary woes.
Source: Amazon

Hachiko escorts Tenchi into a forbidding warehouse of festival supplies, while the Science Club blazes its own trail.
Source: Amazon

Hachiko and Kinojo may be strong, but they`re not the best pair to be stuck in a labyrinth with.
Source: Amazon

Tenchi and his combative companions bust their way out of a problem, and each glimpses a new side of the others.
Source: Amazon

Looks like the school is getting a new transfer student. Meanwhile, Ryoko puts on a masterclass in cooking.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: A Delicious Slip of the Tongue

REGULAR.description:
After witnessing an abrupt end to a pitched battle, Tenchi and young Momo draw closer to their goal.
Source: Amazon

Aeka and Sasami`s café is the talk of the school festival, while red-haired women just won`t stop making trouble for Tenchi.
Source: Amazon

A massive flare-up of egos lands Tenchi in an unexpected, major role in Hachiko`s play.
Source: Amazon

Ms. Kurihara has had enough of Tenchi`s mishaps. But where she sees punishment, Aeka and Sasami see a chance for Tenchi to shine.
Source: Amazon

The Student Council and the Science Club light up the runway. But in the end, beauty is a game for the grown-ups.
Source: Amazon

After things wind down, Saryu comes by with an unusual request. The school`s factions prepare for a new challenge.
Source: Amazon

The Student Council gets psyched up for Sports Day. Ms. Kurihara`s explanation raises the stakes for the clubs -- and even more so for Tenchi!
Source: Amazon

Goriki makes an appearance, throwing the first challenge into disarray. But the Student Council still has teamwork on their side.
Source: Amazon

Goriki`s not out of the running yet, and in the second challenge, the Science Club aims to settle the score.
Source: Amazon

In a most unconventional challenge, Momo makes a risky appeal to the opposing side.
Source: Amazon

How long can one day drag on? Tenchi and Momo share a moment of admiration, but it sounds like our hero may be in for more trouble tomorrow.
Source: Amazon

Tenchi is beset on all sides by the mayhem of a girls` dorm. The Science Club sees a moment of opportunity.
Source: Amazon

A small misunderstanding escalates into a big pinch, forcing Momo to run cover as Tenchi makes overhears a startling truth.
Source: Amazon

In a clandestine ramen meet-up, Tenchi finds out Kinojo has a lot going on under the surface -- as does the Science Club`s dorm room.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: No Need for a Midnight Snack

REGULAR.description:
Young Momo`s link to Kinojo becomes clear at last, and Tenchi prepares to restore order to the past.
Source: Amazon

Kinojo and Tenchi have a frank and fraught heart-to-heart. Count on Momo to step in and save the day... Or to try, anyway.
Source: Amazon

A sympathy cookout for Tenchi becomes a day of truce and relaxation.
Source: Amazon

Tenchi arrives back in the present with some loose ends to tie up. He and Washu plan out a mission that brings the story full circle.
Source: Amazon

The Science Club gets a dressing-down. Kinojo interrupts a quiet evening at the Masaki home with an unexpected proposal.
Source: Amazon

Tenchi gets a clue about the Science Club`s intentions, but the Student Council smells danger.
Source: Amazon

The tables have turned! The Science Club and their new allies square off with the Student Council to buy time as Tenchi goes treasure hunting.
Source: Amazon

Tenchi, Momo and the Science Club uncover a key to everything happening at the school, but getting it won`t be easy.
Source: Amazon

As Tenchi and the others regroup with the Student Council, the Science Club finds a new mission. Ms. Kurihara intercepts a telling communication.
Source: Amazon

Galactic forces have their eye on what`s happening on Earth. As for the Student Council and the Science Club, all`s fair in love and elections.
Source: Amazon

Ethics go out the window as the Science Club campaign makes the most of its guile and technology.
Source: Amazon

The Student Council comes to understand what they`re up against. A past incident catches up with Momo and Tenchi.
Source: Amazon

Even in the face of disastrous consequences, Momo refuses to run or hide. In a rooftop heart-to-heart, she tells Tenchi what drives her.
Source: Amazon

This is it: the showdown for the presidency. Momo won`t let Fuka drag her down. But something even bigger is stirring.
Source: Amazon

As powerful forces close in, the school begins to evacuate. But amid the chaos, the Student Council can`t let even their enemies get left behind.
Source: Amazon

The clock is ticking as Tenchi and his friends seek safety. As Ms. Kurihara`s loyalties become clear, the woman who started everything steps into the open.
Source: Amazon

Washu and the Science Club stand tall against the attackers. Momo and Kinojo finally find an answer they`ve both been seeking.
Source: Amazon

With disaster bearing down, Goriki steps up to the plate. Ryoko makes a major save.
Source: Amazon

Momo faces the hardest decision of her life, while Washu squares off with old adversaries in a battle of wits.
Source: Amazon

Torn from his friends, Tenchi encounters an echo of someone he knows well. Meanwhile, Washu drives a hard bargain.
Source: Amazon

Tenchi continues to chase after shadows, while Washu and her very reluctant adversaries strive for a deal.
Source: Amazon

Ryoko, Kinojo and Washu work to salvage the situation, while Ms. Kurihara settles for cutting her losses.
Source: Amazon

Tenchi`s dimensional dance winds down. The path to fixing what`s been broken is clear, but it demands one brave sacrifice.
Source: Amazon

For Tenchi and his friends, even the students of Junai, some things never really change, even when everything does.
Source: Amazon
